body.name: SMUG Office Desk Computer Chair, Ergonomic High Back Comfy Swivel Gaming Home Mesh Chairs with Wheels, Lumbar Support, Adjustable Headrest,Comfortable Pillow,Soft Arms,120°tilt for Bedroom,Study,Black

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Ergonomic Lumbar Support】The office desk chair with an ergonomic high back to accommodate the natural curvature of the spine, providing maximum support for your lumbar and shoulders. The 90°-120° tilt is designed to meet your relaxation needs with added comfort for all-day sitting. The mesh backrest is highly breathable.

【Adjustable Headrest & Soft Pillow】Height-adjustable headrest for work and relaxation, providing strong support for the head and neck. The soft pillow of this computer desk chair provides comfortable support for the lumbar region and keeps back pain away. Soft leather arms for relaxing hands.

【Comfortable Thick Wide Cushion】The padded cushion of this computer gaming chair is made of high-density shaping memory foam.Thickened design balances softness, durability, and support to reduce pressure on the hips and tailbone.Cushion size: 16.54"×19.49".Designed to meet the needs of big and tall people.

【Multifunction Design】The height of the comfy chair is easily adjustable from 17.32"-21.46".Smooth multi-directional wheels are made of PU material with no resistance and no noise, allowing you to easily move on tile, hardwood floors, and carpets without causing damage to them. A large 5-star-shaped base enhances stability. Weight capacity: 300 lbs.

【Wide Application】This swivel home office chair is perfect for office, bedroom, study, living room, or game room. Good gift for husband, wife, son, friend, family. It‘s also the choice for Christmas, Father's Day, and Mother's Day.

【Easy Installation】The ergonomic mesh office chair comes with all hardware and necessary tools, we also provide manual and videos to help you easily finish the installation in 10-15 minutes. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, our service team will answer within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and easy to build
reviews.reviewText: This chair saved my back after years of using a basic desk chair. Took less than 10 mins to unbox and put together, and it looks fantastic. Great desk chair for a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great office chair!
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to put together, sturdy & quite comfortable. The lower lumbar padding & neck rest is supportive. I highly recommend this chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordable but Uncomfortable
reviews.reviewText: The SMUG Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair, touted as a budget-friendly option, offers various adjustable features but falls short in providing adequate comfort and durability. While it may appeal to those on a tight budget, my experience with this chair has left me unsatisfied with its overall quality.On the positive side, the chair boasts an ergonomic design with adjustable headrest, lumbar support, tilt function, and swivel rolling features. These adjustable elements offer flexibility for finding a comfortable sitting position and provide essential support during long hours of work.However, the main issue lies in the comfort level, particularly for users over 150lbs. The seat cushion bottoms out too quickly, leading to discomfort and inadequate support for heavier individuals. This limitation significantly impacts the overall comfort and usability of the chair, making it unsuitable for extended periods of use.Furthermore, despite its budget-friendly price, the chair's build quality and durability leave much to be desired. It did not withstand regular use for an extended period and showed signs of wear and tear sooner than expected. The overall construction felt flimsy and lacking in robustness.While the low cost may be appealing, it's important to consider the trade-offs in terms of comfort and longevity. As the saying goes, "You get what you pay for," and the SMUG Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair is a prime example of a budget option that sacrifices comfort and durability for affordability.In conclusion, the SMUG Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair may be an economical choice, but its lack of comfort, particularly for users over 150lbs, and its subpar durability make it a less-than-ideal option for daily use. If you prioritize comfort and long-lasting support, investing in a higher-quality chair may be a better choice in the long run.Edit: After initially writing my review, their customer support team reached out to me in an effort to provide a solution to my issue, I am very pleased with the solution I received and this level of customer service is commendable. I’m updating my review to 4 stars (from 2 stars) because of this!
